name: Milk
description: A nutritious liquid from cows or other animals, rich in calcium.

name: Cheddar Cheese
description: A firm, aged cheese with a sharp flavor.

name: Yogurt
description: A fermented dairy product with a creamy texture and tangy flavor.

name: Butter
description: A dairy product made from cream, used for cooking and baking.

name: Mozzarella Cheese
description: A soft, mild cheese often used in Italian dishes.

name: Greek Yogurt
description: A thicker, creamier type of yogurt with higher protein content.

name: Cottage Cheese
description: A soft cheese with a lumpy texture and mild flavor.

name: Ricotta Cheese
description: A soft cheese used in Italian dishes, with a slightly grainy texture.

name: Cream Cheese
description: A soft, spreadable cheese used in baking and as a spread.

name: Swiss Cheese
description: A mild, nutty cheese with characteristic holes.

name: Almond Milk
description: A plant-based milk alternative made from almonds.

name: Soy Milk
description: A plant-based milk alternative made from soybeans.

name: Oat Milk
description: A plant-based milk alternative made from oats.

name: Cashew Cheese
description: A dairy-free cheese alternative made from cashews.

name: Hemp Milk
description: A plant-based milk alternative made from hemp seeds.

name: Coconut Milk
description: A plant-based milk alternative made from coconut.

name: Rice Milk
description: A plant-based milk alternative made from rice.

name: Nut Cheese
description: A dairy-free cheese alternative made from various nuts.

name: Goat Cheese
description: A tangy cheese made from goat's milk.

name: Kefir
description: A fermented dairy product with a tangy flavor, rich in probiotics.
